events.message: I received the wrong item in my recent order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this product is not what I paid for.
The reported issue has been identified as a refund request due to incorrect item delivery according to the customer’s description.
A customer service representative has been assigned to handle this refund case to ensure prompt resolution.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with the refund process.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify and proceed with your refund?
Thank you for the response. Here is my order number 123456 and I have attached photos showing the incorrect item delivered to me.
We have reviewed your photos and confirmed the mistake. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days.
Thank you for addressing this so quickly. I appreciate you processing the refund and look forward to receiving it soon.
The refund process has been completed successfully and you should see the amount reflected on your statement shortly.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and that everything is satisfactory with how your case was handled.
Since you have confirmed the refund was received and no further issues have been reported, we are closing your case now. Thank you!
